titles.title: Coronavirus Relief Flexibility for Students and Institutions Act
Coronavirus Relief Flexibility for Students and Institutions Act
Coronavirus Relief Flexibility for Students and Institutions Act
A bill to amend the provisions relating to the higher education emergency relief fund to clarify the flexibility provided to institutions and for students under the fund, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

term.name: Emergency medical services and trauma care
